meanings.definition: Relating to the study of fossils.
meanings.sent1: The paleontologic research team discovered a new dinosaur fossil.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed an impressive collection of paleontologic findings.
meanings.sent3: The paleontologic expert joked that the fossil looked like a petrified pancake.
meanings.sent4: Her paleontologic knowledge was as deep as the layers of sedimentary rock.
meanings.sent5: The paleontologic expedition unearthed a treasure trove of ancient remains.

meanings.definition: Involving the scientific study of prehistoric life through fossils.
meanings.sent1: The paleontologic evidence supported the theory of ancient ecosystems.
meanings.sent2: Researchers used paleontologic techniques to analyze the fossil record.
meanings.sent3: The paleontologic team celebrated a breakthrough in understanding prehistoric creatures.
meanings.sent4: His paleontologic approach to history revealed fascinating insights into the past.
meanings.sent5: The paleontologic expedition uncovered a wealth of information about ancient life forms.
